thread.title: Wonderful hotel and location!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel and location! - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chandra P
title: Wonderful hotel and location!
text:
Two sets of double french doors yielded a breathtaking view of Louvre, Tuileries, Musee D'Orsay, Eiffel Tower. Cross the street and you're literally inside Jardin de Tuileries!! Very friendly and professional staff, they quickly took care of every need. Comfortable beds - which is one of the most important things to me next to cleanliness, nice sized room, very clean. The street below was alive during the day but very quiet at night. We all slept very well. Easy access to restaurants, shopping, transportation and sites.
Room Tip: My room was on the 2nd floor, west facing, which was high enough to get an unobstructed view. We ha... See more room tips
